General.Name: Niche Capital Emas Holdings
General.Description: Niche Capital Emas Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells gold jewelry and ornaments in Malaysia. The company operates through four segments: Trading, Construction and Services, Mining, and Others. It is also involved in the retail of jewelry products; trading, distribution, and wholesale of jewelry and jadeite stones, as well as other precious stones and metals; and distribution and sales of medical devices. In addition, the company engages in the project management business; and construction and property related business. Further, it is involved in the exploration of minerals; and mining and related businesses. Niche Capital Emas Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
